titlealts.searchtitle: Data Set: CDS V6-2-2 Type 004 - CDS Message Trailer - Overview

body.p: The CDS V6-2-2 Type 004 - Commissioning Data Set Message Trailer carries mandatory controls for a Commissioning Data Set Message and is only used by inclusion in other CDS Types .
Note that the CDS V6-2-2 Type 004 - Commissioning Data Set Message Trailer should only be used when submitting the CDS V6-2-2 Type 011 - Emergency Care CDS .

Commissioning Data Set Interchanges containing Commissioning Data Set Messages submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service must use the required Commissioning Data Set Interchange and Message Header and Trailer Controls to provide the correct addressing and identification for the data flows.
Multiple Commissioning Data Set messages are usually sent in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange which consists of:

div.xref: CDS V6-2-2 Type 001 - Commissioning Data Set Interchange Header
div.p: - Mandatory - One per Commissioning Data Set Interchange

li.xref: CDS V6-2-2 Type 003 - Commissioning Data Set Message Header
li.p: - Mandatory - One per Commissioning Data Set Message

body.p: Dependent upon the Commissioning_Data_Set_Submission_Protocol being used, one of the following must be used:

div.xref: CDS V6-2-2 Type 005B - Commissioning Data Set Transaction Header Group - Bulk Update Protocol

li.xref: CDS V6-2-2 Type 005N - Commissioning Data Set Transaction Header Group - Net Change Protocol

div.p: The CDS Type - As required to carry the specific Commissioning Data Set data records

body.p: Each Commissioning Data Set message ends with:

div.xref: CDS V6-2-2 Type 004 - Commissioning Data Set Message Trailer
div.p: - Mandatory - One per Commissioning Data Set Message

body.p: Each Commissioning Data Set Interchange ends with:

div.xref: CDS V6-2-2 Type 002 - Commissioning Data Set Interchange Trailer
div.p: - Mandatory - One per Commissioning Data Set Interchange

p.b: To access more detailed information on the Commissioning Data Sets, see the Commissioning_Data_Sets_Introduction .

body.p: A high-level view of the Data Groups carried in the CDS V6-2-2 Type 004 - Commissioning Data Set Message Trailer is shown below.
See Commissioning Data Set Notation for an explanation of Group Status and Group Repeats.

stentry.b: DATA GROUP OVERVIEW: CDS V6-2-2 TYPE 004 - COMMISSIONING DATA SET MESSAGE TRAILER
FUNCTION: To define the mandatory identity and addressing information for a Commissioning Data Set submission .
DATA GROUP: CDS V6-2-2 Type 004 - Commissioning Data Set Message Trailer
stentry.p: One per Commissioning Data Set Message submitted to the Secondary_Uses_Service . Multiple Commissioning Data Set Messages may be submitted in a single Commissioning Data Set Interchange.
